The claim of a 400: increase in black business ownership is based on a survey conducted by two private companies, Guidant Financial and LendingClub Corporation, in November 2017.
The survey was sent to their clientele n: including both current and aspiring entrepreneurs, and received responses from about 2,600 individuals.
The aggregated findings of the survey we: websites in January, but they did not specifically reference race or ethnicity in their results.
